description:
Plan and execute your canoe trip to Killarney Provincial Park with this thoughtfully designed map. Two-sided design lets you plot route options on the planning side of the map using whiteboard markers and a quick reference itinerary chart. The map even comes with route suggestions for different experience levels. Flip over to the trip side of the map to use colour-coded routes for navigation.

  • Includes PEI, Pt. Grondine, and Crown land
  • Includes Ontario Parks’ updated campsite numbering system (2023), these numbers are great to have when making site reservations
  • POIs rated with stars, makes it easy to know if you should detour to a lookout or continue on your way
  • Colour-coded routes and types of POIs
  • Remote areas highlighted
  • Portage steepness indicators help you plan
name: Unlostify Killarney Version 1.2
